response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is valued at $15,000 by many. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering this extraordinary opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive price of $12,000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and value, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
